newsitem.title: BRAZIL: EU trade chief Brittan to visit Brazil this week.
newsitem.headline: EU trade chief Brittan to visit Brazil this week.

text.p: European Union Trade Commissioner Sir Leon Brittan was due to arrive in Brazil on Thursday for a two-day official visit to the South American nation, the EU's delegation in Brasilia said on Tuesday.
Brittan was scheduled to meet with President Fernando Henrique Cardoso and several of his ministers during his trip, the delegation said in a statement.
The four-nation Mercosur group, of which Brazil is a member, has signed an agreement with the EU setting the foundations for future negotiations between the two trade groups.
A spokewoman at Brazil's foreign ministry said Brazil would complain to Brittan about what it sees as trade barriers to its agricultural exports to the EU.
